import React from 'react' import { repeatIcon, shieldIcon, mapIcon, facebookIcon, youtubeIcon, instagramIcon, twitterIcon } from '../icons/icons.js' import '../styles/footerContainer.css' const Footer = () => { return ( <>

{facebookIcon}{youtubeIcon}{instagramIcon}{twitterIcon}
) } export default Footer
